basics.name: Ayesha Samreen
basics.summary: PhD student in Computer Science at Iowa State University

work.summary: Conducting research in Responsible and Trustworthy AI with a focus on differential privacy and fairness in deep learning models.

Assisted in delivering lectures and recitations for the computer science undergrad courses. Held weekly office hours to support student learning. Assisted in designing and grading assignments, quizzes, and exams.
Worked on modernizing the service portal, created ATF test suites, and managed day to day incidents on ServiceNow platform.

education.institution: The University of Texas at Dallas

education.area: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering

publications.name: Efficient Fair Learning with Subset Selection
publications.summary: This work is about fair and efficient machine learning which uses bi-level optimization approach to enhance fairness, overall accuracy, and reduce the computational cost.

publications.name: Brain Tumor Detection by Using Convolution Neural Network
publications.publisher: International Journal of Online and Biomedical Engineering (iJOE)
publications.summary: This work aimed to increase the efficiency in detecting brain tumor using convolution neural network.

publications.name: Monitoring of Patient Critical Health Parameters by using a Low-Cost IoT based System
Low Cost IoT Based Emission Monitoring System for Thermal Power Plants
publications.publisher: Innovations in Power and Advanced Computing Technologies (i-PACT)
